 2 
 404.  UCSD subsequently received a brief notice from the DOD Department of 
 3 
 the Air Force that stated: “The Government intends to terminate this Award under the authority of 
 4 
 2 CFR 200.340(a)(4).” No explanation of any kind for the termination was provided.  
 5 
 405.  On March 3, 2025, DOD issued a Grant/Cooperative Agreement 
 6 
 Modification. Again, it provided no explanation for the termination beyond form language:  
 7  
 The subject grant award no longer effectuates the program goals or 
 8  agency priorities as found in 2 CFR 200.340(a)(4) as incorporated 
 9  Conditions for grants by reference. 
 10 
 406.  As a result of the modification, the DOD eliminated the third year of
